differences.1: WE; are a specialized; event; with a mission; for secure; and accessible; digital; payments;

differences.4: DIGIPAY; unites; businesses;, regulators;, and users;, putting users; at the center;
differences.5: DIGIPAY; seeks strong; partnerships; to promote secure; digital payments; in Bulgaria; and Central and Eastern Europe;
differences.6: Our goal; is to transform; your mission; into a competitive advantage; through customer; education;
